name: BeCow
description:
What is this game?

A 2 players game where you play as a pretty strange cow.

You play on a grid made of grass. You can eat grass by walking on it. The more you eat, the more points you obtain.

In order to win, you must eat more than the other cow.

Unleash the cow

Eating grass fill a jauge, allowing you to scream and poop.

Screaming will stun the other cow for a moment.

The poo create a temporary bad smell zone. The other cow can't get close.

Keep in mind

This game is more of an experiment than a real game.

Feedbacks are welcomed though!
